project.description: THIS IS THE STARTING POINT FOR A MANUAL BUILD OF THE COI APPLICATION

secureScript.script:
def opendiv = "
" def checkbox = "" def desc = "Prints out would be calls to other jobs, but do not go through with them." def closediv = "
" return opendiv + checkbox + desc + closediv

" def checkbox = "" def desc = "If checked log output will be verbose." def closediv = "
" return opendiv + checkbox + desc + closediv

" def checkbox = "" def desc = "Run migrations against the database when the docker container starts up?" def closediv = "

def opendiv = "
" def checkbox = "" def desc = "Up-to-date docker image already in registry. Skip ahead to the last step (pull)" def closediv = "

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REPO_URL
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git repository from which the build will pull source code.

secureScript.script: def url = "git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-coi.git" return "<input type='text' name='value' style='width:400px; font-family:monospace;' value='" + url + "'>"

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: GIT_REF_TYPE
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description: Select how you would like to determine your git commit ID

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' readonly=true name='value' value='error' style='width:400px; font-family:monospace;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_COMMIT_ID
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: This is the git commit ID that the build will be based on.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' disabled=true style='font-family:monospace; width:400px;'>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: VERSION
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description:
This value reflects the git tag applied to the codebase the docker image will be based on. The git commit may not be the exact commit that was tagged, but would be the most recent commit since that tag before the next tag is encountered. VERSION follows the convention of YYMM.xxxx
Example: "1802.0001"
This version would specify the January release for 2018 (The month indicates February, but "0001" indicates the very first commit, which the same as the last commit the previous day.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='font-family:monospace; width:400px;'>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: LANDSCAPE
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: What landscape is the target EC2 instance in?

secureScript.script: def sb = new StringBuilder("<select name='value' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace;'>") sb.append("<option selected=true value='sb'>sb</option>") sb.append("<option value='ci'>ci</option>") sb.append("<option value='qa'>qa</option>") sb.append("<option value='stg'>stg</option>") sb.append("<option value='prod'>prod</option>") sb.append("</select>") return sb.toString()

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: TARGET
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: Is build for a feature branch (not the main line of git development)?

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace' disabled=true>"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ "$(echo $VERBOSE | sed 's/,//g')" == false ] && set +x
# Static and private variables ECR_REGISTRY_URL=730096353738.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com GIT_SCRIPT_URL=git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git GIT_SCRIPT_BRANCH=master CLI=/var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-cli.jar HOST=http://localhost:8080/ EC2_IDS=() CMDS=()
# Fix the trailing comma issue with active choices parameters reactive DEBUG="$(echo $DEBUG | sed 's/,//g')" MIGRATIONS="$(echo $MIGRATIONS | sed 's/,//g')" NO_BUILD="$(echo $NO_BUILD | sed 's/,//g')" GIT_REPO_URL="$(echo $GIT_REPO_URL | sed 's/,//g')" GIT_REF="$(echo $GIT_REF | sed 's/,//g')" GIT_COMMIT_ID="$(echo $GIT_COMMIT_ID | sed 's/,//g')" ECR_REGISTRY_URL="$(echo $ECR_REGISTRY_URL | sed 's/,//g')" VERSION="$(echo $VERSION | sed 's/,//g')" LANDSCAPE="$(echo $LANDSCAPE | sed 's/,//g')" TARGET="$(echo $TARGET | sed 's/,//g')" NOTIFY_EMAIL="$(echo $NOTIFY_EMAIL | sed 's/,//g')"
# Validate the job parameters [ -z "$GIT_REPO_URL" ] && echo "ERROR! GIT_REPO_URL cannot be empty!" && exit 1 [ -z "$GIT_COMMIT_ID" ] && echo "ERROR! GIT_COMMIT_ID cannot be empty!" && exit 1
EC2_INSTANCE_ID="$(echo $EC2_INSTANCE_ID | sed 's/,//g')"
case "$LANDSCAPE" in "sb") EC2_IDS=("i-099de1c5407493f9b" "i-0c2d2ef87e98f2088");; "ci") BRANCH="bu-master" EC2_IDS=("i-0258a5f2a87ba7972" "i-0511b83a249cd9fb1");; "qa") EC2_IDS=("i-011ccd29dec6c6d10");; "stg") EC2_IDS=("i-090d188ea237c8bcf" "i-0cb479180574b4ba2");; "prod") EC2_IDS=("i-0534c4e38e6a24009" "i-07d7b5f3e629e89ae");; esac
source /var/lib/jenkins/cli-credentials.sh for i in $(seq ${#EC2_IDS[@]}); do if [ $i -eq 1 ] && [ "$NO_BUILD" != true ] ; then # First iteration, therefore do all build steps CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-coi-1-pull-build-scripts' -v -f \ -p GIT_REPO_URL=${GIT_SCRIPT_URL} \ -p GIT_BRANCH=${GIT_SCRIPT_BRANCH} \ -p ROOT_DIR=${WORKSPACE}" CMDS[${#CMDS[@]}]=$CMD
CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-coi-2-build-docker-image' -v -f \ -p VERBOSE=${VERBOSE} \ -p DRYRUN=false \ -p GIT_PULL=true \ -p GIT_REPO_URL=${GIT_REPO_URL} \ -p GIT_REF=${GIT_REF} \ -p GIT_COMMIT_ID=${GIT_COMMIT_ID} \ -p VERSION=${VERSION} \ -p ECR_REGISTRY_URL=${ECR_REGISTRY_URL} \ -p REGISTRY_REPO_NAME=${TARGET} \ -p ROOT_DIR=${WORKSPACE}" CMDS[${#CMDS[@]}]=$CMD
CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-coi-3-push-docker-image' -v -f \ -p VERBOSE=${VERBOSE} \ -p ECR_REGISTRY_URL=${ECR_REGISTRY_URL} \ -p VERSION=${VERSION} \ -p REGISTRY_REPO_NAME=${TARGET}" CMDS[${#CMDS[@]}]=$CMD fi
CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-coi-4-run-docker-container' -v -f \ -p VERBOSE=${VERBOSE} \ -p GIT_REPO_URL=${GIT_SCRIPT_URL} \ -p GIT_BRANCH=${GIT_SCRIPT_BRANCH} \ -p ECR_REGISTRY_URL=${ECR_REGISTRY_URL} \ -p REGISTRY_REPO_NAME=${TARGET} \ -p VERSION=${VERSION} \ -p LANDSCAPE=${LANDSCAPE} \ -p BLAST_IMAGE=true \ -p MIGRATIONS=${MIGRATIONS} \ -p EC2_INSTANCE_ID=${EC2_IDS[i-1]}\ -p ROOT_DIR=${WORKSPACE}"
CMDS[${#CMDS[@]}]=$CMD done;
for ((i = 0; i < ${#CMDS[@]}; i++)) ; do CMD_PRINTABLE="$(echo "${CMDS[i]}" | sed 's/[[:space:]][[:space:]]*\-p/\n\0/g')" printf "\n$CMD_PRINTABLE\n" [ "$DEBUG" == false ] && eval "${CMDS[i]}" done
printf "\n\nBuild Completed!"
